thread.title: Video: GoPro captures the joy of a flying baby
thread.title_full: Video: GoPro captures the joy of a flying baby - Telegraph

author: Telegraph Video , Storyful/YouTube/CW Pierce
title: Video: GoPro captures the joy of a flying baby
text: A doting father captured on film the pure joy of his baby daughter as she flew out of his arms and into the air. The footage, captured on a GoPro , shows the baby being launched into the sky and caught in her father's arms over and over as she squeals with delight. Baby Adrienne flies out of her father's arms The baby, called Adrienne, can be seen opening her arms and giggling as she flies through the sky above a trampoline and lands back in her father's arms. The film was shot by Adrienne's father who was wearing a GoPro on his head while bouncing on a trampoline with his daughter in a garden. @telegraphnews
